'''Super Magnificent Pizza''' is a [[food]] that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Super Magnificent Pizza is obtained from the [[Mail/New Recipe Rewards (2023-04-03)|New Recipe Rewards]] mail.

Depending on the quality, Super Magnificent Pizza increases all party members' {{Color|Physical DMG}} by '''25'''/'''35'''/'''45'''% and CRIT Rate by '''6'''/'''8'''/'''10'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
